resources.string: Are you sure you want to add this visual bookmark?

Record Screen: As you record the lecture and take notes, you can save an important moment in the lecture ("Tags") using the "Tag Now" button. Each time, write down the number that appears at your current place in the notes (a "Bookmark"). When you're finished recording, you can take a picture of your written notes and fill in some metadata about your new Note.

Notebook Screen: Lists all your stored Notes. Tap on a Note to bring up the Study View of that Note. Long press to edit or delete a Note.

Study Screen: Displays an image of your written notes and lets you listen back to your lecture. Tap anywhere to bring up playback controls for your lecture. The next and back buttons on the edges of the control bar jump to the nearest tag. To sync the written Bookmarks with your audio Tags, long press on each of the numbered Bookmarks in order. Now, when you listen to your audio, you can simply tap on a Bookmark to seek to that Tag in the audio.
